title: Ticket #1428: Have a DAGMan option to force all jobs to use default log file
description: I think it would be a good idea to have a config knob to force all node jobs to use the default log file (as an easy workaround if people run out of file descriptors). This should be pretty easy to do if specifying a log file on the condor_submit command line overrides one specified in the submit file.
creator: wenger
